Apologies if this has been covered in another topic, I did search for it but couldn\'t find one.

Can someone please explain how to keep the in-flight ships from the previous version of the game, and transfer them into the new version.

Many thanks.

Due to changes in the game, previous saves and craft files are not compatible. This is a common issue in alpha development, so be prepared.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Well, technically if you were really savvy about the changes made in the updates and had a newer persistence and/or craft file to compare the old one(s) to, you could do it. But it really isn\'t worth the hassle.
Actually it\'s quite easy. Open the save files (.craft file) with a text editor and change the version = 0.??.? to your current version and your are set to go
